item.title: Designing stuff... isn't for me
item.description: I created some designs for this site during development, although they didn't make it to the current version, I thought it would be a good idea to keep them around somewhere... Inline SVG Logo "admi_" This logo was on the front page until 2025. It should represent a sysadmin typing "admin" as username to a login prompt. The "mi" highlight represents my initials as well the site. Blinking cursor stuff requires some custom CSS I abandoned by now.

item.title: Hello, Friend!
item.description: Istv√°n Merza is your System Admininstrator. whoami * Istv√°n Merza, S√∂rfut√°r * Information Systems Engineer * IT Administrator, sysadmin * Identity&Access Management * Based in Munich, Germany * Hungarian Monty Python fan * Liquor of Choice: BEER why this site * online presence * experiment * learn * for professional inquiries please use LinkedIn funstuff * SysAdminDay! * Switch to the üåò dark site * Send me a beerüç∫ * Watch Youtube * Follow r/sysadmin on reddit contact * Ping me on Telegram or WhatsApp * Find me at GitHub, GitLab, LinkedIn, Twitter * Send me an email using my PGP Public Key _ _ ____ _ (_)___| |___ ____ _ _ __ / __ \ _ __ ___ ___ _ __ ______ _ (_)___ | / __| __\ \ / / _` | '_ \ / / _` | '_ ` _ \ / _ \ '__|_ / _` | | / __| | \__ \ |_ \ V / (_| | | | | | (_| | | | | | | __/ | / / (_| |_| \__ \ |_|___/\__| \_/ \__,_|_| |_|\ \__,_|_| |_| |_|\___|_| /___\__,_(_)_|___/ \____/

item.title: Converting AD timestamps to Excel date
item.description: How To convert AD / NTFS timestamps like pwdLastSet or lastLogonTimeStamp into Excel Date: Convert online: https://www.epochconverter.com/ldap Convert using Command Line: w32tm /ntte {serial} Convert using Excel formula: =(A1/10^11/8,64)-109205

item.title: Writing about stuff
item.description: A long time ago one of my managers told me “you should write a blog!”… I dismissed the idea back then mainly because I did not like following the trends and I did not want to make another Wordpress site on the internet… But yesterday late night while browsing memes on 9gag I came across this picture of a Japanese girl band whose name did not come to my mind…

item.title: Looking at things
item.description: Earthwatching rulz I used to watch the ISS HDEV streams here, but they have been shut down for a while. I hope the ISS will stay up there for a few years more! Greetings to fellow space enthusiasts! https://eol.jsc.nasa.gov/ESRS/HDEV/ https://spotthestation.nasa.gov/

item.title: developing this site
item.description: Website is alive! woo hoo, I had such a great idea that I registered this domain and started developing this site in 2019. But there is no new content in 5 years now?! So I decided to give it some more love. why .is ? Dude my given name starts like that… and it’s kinda domain hack. And one of my fav places on Earth ‚ô•Eisland‚ô• changelog 26-May-2025: upgrade to Terminal CSS template customize hugo-theme-console for my taste backup & reinstall VPS to latest LTS.
